user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Johnson (mark@helpinghands.org) with the necessary details for the upcoming charity gala. You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["mark@helpinghands.org"],"subject":"Upcoming Charity Gala – Final Details and Next Steps","body":"Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m looking forward to our charity gala coming up soon and wanted to outline the key details and a few next steps:

Event Snapshot
• Date: March 5th
• Time: 6:00 PM – 11:00 PM
• Venue: Grand Ballroom at the Metropolitan Hotel
• Guest Speaker: Mr. Thomas Anderson
• Activities: Silent auction, live music, dinner, and an award ceremony

Action Items
1. Volunteer Team – Could you please confirm the volunteer assignments and any remaining gaps? I’ll make sure they have arrival instructions and contact details.
2. Guest List – When you have the latest list, I’ll coordinate our table placements and seating chart.
3. Final Run-Through – Let’s schedule a brief call early next week to walk through the evening’s timeline and ensure everything is in place.

If there’s anything else you need on my end—sponsor information, signage approvals, or auction logistics—just let me know.

Thank you for your partnership. We’re on track for a fantastic evening that will make a real difference for the community.

Best regards,
Jane

Jane Smith
Bank Manager | Trustworthy Financial Group"}
